resources.string: Light Flip is a variant of Lights Out, a puzzle game. Tap a tile to change the color of all tiles in the same row or column. The aim of the puzzle is to color all the tiles blue.

Stuck? Try out these hints for the 2-color puzzles:
 - Find a sequence of clicks to flip 4 tiles that form a rectangle
 - Find a sequence of clicks to flip one tile in even boards
